Summary._: TRACK MAINTENANCE  May 7 - 11, Mon to Fri, 945 AM to 3 PM  [7] Hudson Yards-bound trains in Queens skip 69, 52, 46, 40 and 33 Sts

LongDescription:
TRACK MAINTENANCE | May 7 - 11, Mon to Fri, 9:45 AM to 3 PM
[7] Hudson Yards-bound trains in Queens skip 69, 52, 46, 40 and 33 Sts


For service to these stations, take the [7] to 61 St-Woodside or Queensboro Plaza
and transfer to a Flushing-bound [7].

For service from these stations, take the [7] to 61 St-Woodside or 74 St and transfer
to a Hudson Yards-bound [7].

Summary._: Rockaways Long-Term Flood Protection  Until May 18, Mon to Fri, 6 AM to 10 AM & 330 PM to 8 PM No [A] service  to/from  Rockaway Park-Beach 116 St

Description._: Rockaways Long-Term Flood Protection  Until May 18, Mon to Fri, 6 AM to 10 AM & 330 PM to 8 PM No [A] service  to/from  Rockaway Park-Beach 116 St

LongDescription:
Rockaways Long-Term Flood Protection | Until May 18, Mon to Fri, 6 AM to 10 AM & 3:30 PM to 8 PM
No [A] service to/from Rockaway Park-Beach 116 St


[A] trains that were scheduled to operate to/from Rockaway Park-Beach 116 St will operate to/from Euclid Av instead.

[S] No Rockaway Park Shuttle service at Broad Channel.

[S] Rockaway Park Shuttle operates, approximately every 20 minutes, between Rockaway Park-Beach 116 St and Beach 90 St and via the [A] to/from Far Rockaway-Mott Av.

For Beach 90 St, Beach 98 St, Beach 105 St and Rockaway Park-Beach 116 St, transfer to the [S] Rockaway Park Shuttle at Beach 67 St.

Click here for additional details on this Flood Protection Project.

[ad] This service change affects one or more ADA accessible stations. Please call 511 for help with planning
your trip. If you are deaf or hard of hearing, use your preferred relay service provider or the free 711 relay.

Rockaways Long-Term Flood Protection | Until Friday May 18, 2018
[S] No Rockaway Park Shuttle service at Broad Channel - Take the [A] instead
[A] No rush hour service to/from Rockaway Park-Beach 116 St


[S] Rockaway Park Shuttle operates, approximately every 20 minutes, between
Rockaway Park-Beach 116 St and Beach 90 St and via the [A] to/from Far Rockaway-Mott Av.

For Broad Channel, take the [A], transfer to the [S] Rockaway Park Shuttle at Beach 67 St.

Alternate travel note for Broad Channel:
Q52 SBS, Q53 SBS, QM16 and QM17 service is also available at Cross Bay Blvd and Noel Rd.

Click here for additional details on this Flood Protection Project.

Summary._: TRACK REPLACEMENT  May 8 - 11,  Tue to Fri , 945 AM to 330 PM Broad St-bound [J] and Forest Hills-bound [M] trains skip Flushing Av, Lorimer St and Hewes St

Description._: TRACK REPLACEMENT  May 8 - 11,  Tue to Fri , 945 AM to 330 PM Broad St-bound [J] and Forest Hills-bound [M] trains skip Flushing Av, Lorimer St and Hewes St

LongDescription:
TRACK REPLACEMENT | May 8 - 11, Tue to Fri, 9:45 AM to 3:30 PM
Broad St-bound [J] and Forest Hills-bound [M] trains skip Flushing Av, Lorimer St and Hewes St

For service to these stations, take the [J] or [M] to Essex St* and transfer to a
Jamaica Center-bound [J] or Brooklyn-bound [M].

For service from these stations, take the [J] or [M] to Myrtle Av and transfer to a
Broad St-bound [J] or Forest Hills-bound [M].

*Transfer at Marcy Av with Unlimited Ride MetroCard.

Alternate travel note:
Take the B46 bus via transfer at Myrtle Av or Marcy Av.

[ad] This service change affects one or more ADA accessible stations. Please call 511 for help with planning
your trip. If you are deaf or hard of hearing, use your preferred relay service provider or the free 711 relay.
